title: Roadex III: Health issues related to poorly maintained road networks

author: Johan Granlund, Vägverket Konsult – Swedish Road Administration Consulting Services

The President, the outline of the presentation I'm giving to you is that.
First of all, I will introduce the Northern Periphery Robotics 3 Project Partners.
